resources.string: Chinese Language Resource Pack For Toolbox
This project is open source to GitHub

Add your Chinese language to your Toolbox module!\n\nPlease click the button below to install the resource pack. After you finish, please launch Toolbox and apply it in \"Settings > Global Resource Pack\".
Download now \"Chinese Language Resource Pack For Toolbox\", Let your \"Toolbox Mod\" have Chinese language!
\"Minecraft (BE)\" Not Installed, Please go to Google Play download!
\"Toolbox for Minecraft: PE\" Not Installed, Please go to Google Play download!
Toolbox is enabled, please apply \"Toolbox Chinese Language Pack\" in \"Settings > Global Resource Pack\".\n\nAlternatively, the problem with Toolbox is not to reward us, please report back to them.
\"Toolbox Chinese Language Resource Pack\" Successfully Deleted!
Unable To Delete, Maybe you haven\'t installed the \"Toolbox Chinese Language Resource Pack\".
Please help this app rate 5 stars, thank you!
No applications were found to start the market:// link.
No browsers were found to open web pages.
No internet connection, please check your network status.

Are you sure you want to install "Toolbox Chinese Language Resource Pack" now?
Clicking to confirm will open "Toolbox for Minecraft: PE" immediately.

Open the resource pack in "Settings > Global Resource Pack". If it is not found, please change the "File Storage Location" in the game "Settings > Profile" to "External".

Remind you that this language file is translated according to the version of Toolbox %s, but if future versions of the Toolbox language file are not supported, please don't mess with comments on Google Play comments.
Are you sure you want to launch "Minecraft (BE)"?
Are you sure you want to launch "Toolbox for Minecraft: PE"?
You must authorize the application to access the device file for the function to work.
Are you sure you want to delete the \"Toolbox Chinese Language Resource Pack\"?
Click OK to go to Google Play, please rate our app as 5 stars, thank you!
